ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Blackbox Refiner
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah I tried asking him too and he didn t respond to it.  I also tried right clicking on the glow rod and clicking on it and then on a rusted blackbox thinking
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah I tried asking him too and he didn't respond to it. I also tried
right clicking on the glow rod and clicking on it and then on a rusted
blackbox thinking the grow rod was a refiner and that didn't do anything.
It's odd that the rod has a blank Effect: and when you right click on it
it says it's out of charges. Seems like all it does is act as a small
lightsource. Might as well call it a small lantern.

---
gr0k - Stranger in a Strange Land - http://www.juju.org
Ubershadow Leprechaun - Level 28 Gnome Rogue
Uberkniggit - Level 5 Troll Shadowknight
